name: Lich went to a graveyard and lost his glasses
name_original: Lich went to a graveyard and lost his glasses
description:
Short tower defense game made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

All arts,sounds and codes were made during the 48h competition

WASD -To move; 

N -To start the next wave; 

R-To Reset

1- Buy Archer Tower

2- Buy Ice Tower

3-Buy Mage Tower

4-Buy Healer Towers 

=============================Credits=============================

Gui Mendonça- Director and Progammer

Gabriel Severino - Art Director

Gabriel Bavati - Sound Director

Pedro Antonio - Creative Director
